page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT_SCHOOL 1
page.content:
In our{school}there are 11 class teachers,1 remedial teacher,5 visiting teachers 1 assistant head and our head teacher.When all the other employees are included a total of 31 people work in Lhanbryde Primary School.
Mr.MacDonald is our{head teacher.} He makes sure that the school runs properly. He often has to work at night and travel to Elgin and Aberdeen
Our class{teachers}teach us many subjects. They make sure we work hard and neatly and that we behave ourselves in class. Their names are as follows:Mrs.Stuart, Mrs.Gaffney, Mrs.Silvestri, Mrs.Younie, Miss Angus, Mr. Milligan, Mr.Mackay, Mrs.Harris, Mrs. Marshall,Mrs.Crockett(Assistant Head) and Mrs.Bennett. Mr. Cordiner is the remedial teacher.
